source: The Receiving Party agrees to hold in confidence and not disclose to any third party any Confidential Information disclosed by the Disclosing Party. The Receiving Party shall use the Confidential Information solely for the purpose of evaluating a potential business relationship between the parties. This obligation shall survive termination of this Agreement for a period of five (5) years.
target: The party receiving confidential information must keep it secret and not share it with anyone else. They can only use this information to decide whether to do business together. This secrecy requirement lasts for 5 years, even after the agreement ends.

source: The Receiving Party shall strictly maintain the confidentiality of the Proprietary Information. Proprietary Information may be shared only with Receiving Party's employees who need to know such information for the purpose of performing obligations under this Agreement and who are bound by written confidentiality obligations at least as restrictive as those herein. The Receiving Party shall not reverse engineer, disassemble, or decompile any prototypes, software, or other tangible objects which embody the Proprietary Information.

source: Upon the termination or expiration of this Agreement, or upon the Disclosing Party's earlier request, the Receiving Party shall promptly return to the Disclosing Party or, at the Disclosing Party's option, destroy all Confidential Information and any copies, extracts, or derivatives thereof. The Receiving Party shall provide a written certification of such return or destruction signed by an authorized officer of the Receiving Party within ten (10) days of such compliance.
target: When this agreement ends (or earlier if requested), the receiving party must immediately return or destroy all confidential information and any copies. The receiving party must provide written proof, signed by an authorized officer, that they have done this within 10 days.

source: This Agreement shall be governed by the laws of India. Any dispute arising out of or in connection with this Agreement, including any question regarding its existence, validity or termination, shall be referred to and finally resolved by arbitration in New Delhi in accordance with the Arbitration and Conciliation Act, 1996. The tribunal shall consist of a sole arbitrator appointed by mutual agreement of the Parties. The language of the arbitration shall be English.
target: This agreement follows Indian laws. Any disputes about this agreement (including whether it's valid or has ended) will be resolved through arbitration in New Delhi under India's Arbitration Act 1996. Both parties will agree on one arbitrator, and the arbitration will be conducted in English.

source: The Indemnifying Party shall defend, indemnify and hold harmless the Indemnified Party from any and all claims, damages, losses, liabilities, costs and expenses (including reasonable attorneys' fees) arising from the acts, omissions or negligence of the Indemnifying Party in the performance of services under this Agreement, except to the extent caused by the gross negligence or willful misconduct of the Indemnified Party.
target: Party A must protect Party B from legal claims and pay all related costs (including lawyer fees) if those claims arise from Party A's actions, mistakes, or carelessness while doing the agreed work. However, Party A does NOT have to protect Party B if the claims are caused by Party B's own serious negligence or intentional wrongdoing.

source: Provider shall indemnify, defend and hold Customer harmless from and against any and all losses, damages, liabilities, costs (including reasonable attorneys' fees) ("Losses") incurred by Customer resulting from any third-party claim, suit, action or proceeding ("Third-Party Claim") that the Services, or any use of the Services in accordance with this Agreement, infringes or misappropriates such third party's intellectual property rights, provided that Customer promptly notifies Provider in writing of the claim, cooperates with Provider, and allows Provider sole authority to control the defense and settlement of such claim.
target: The Provider will protect the Customer and pay all costs (including lawyer fees) if a third party sues the Customer claiming that the Provider's Services violate their intellectual property rights. However, the Customer must notify the Provider immediately about any lawsuit, cooperate with the Provider's defense, and allow the Provider to fully control how the case is defended or settled.

source: Each Party (the "Indemnifying Party") agrees to indemnify, defend, and hold harmless the other Party and its officers, directors, employees, and agents (the "Indemnified Parties") from and against any and all third-party claims, demands, losses, liabilities, and expenses (including reasonable legal fees) arising out of or relating to: (a) the Indemnifying Party's gross negligence or willful misconduct; or (b) the Indemnifying Party's material breach of its representations and warranties under this Agreement.
target: Both parties agree to protect each other and pay all costs (including legal fees) if a third party makes a claim against the other party due to: (1) serious negligence or intentional wrongdoing, or (2) breaking the promises and guarantees made in this agreement.

source: Seller agrees to indemnify and save Buyer harmless from any and all judgments, orders, decrees, awards, costs, expenses, including attorney's fees and settlements, and claims on account of damage to property or bodily injury (including death) which may be sustained by Buyer, Buyer's employees, or third parties, arising out of or in connection with any defect in the Goods sold hereunder or the use thereof, except to the extent caused by Buyer's negligence.

source: Either party may terminate this Agreement upon thirty (30) days' written notice to the other party. Upon termination, each party shall return or destroy all Confidential Information received from the other party. Sections 3, 5, and 7 shall survive any termination or expiration of this Agreement.
target: Both parties can end this agreement by giving written notice 30 days in advance. When the agreement ends, each party must return or destroy all confidential information they received. Certain sections (3, 5, and 7) remain valid even after the agreement is terminated.

source: Either Party may terminate this Agreement immediately upon written notice if the other Party: (a) commits a material breach of this Agreement and fails to cure such breach within thirty (30) days after receiving written notice of the breach; (b) becomes the subject of a voluntary petition in bankruptcy or any voluntary proceeding relating to insolvency; or (c) ceases to conduct business in the ordinary course.
target: Either party can immediately cancel this agreement with written notice if the other party: (1) seriously breaks the agreement and doesn't fix it within 30 days after being notified, (2) files for bankruptcy, or (3) stops doing business normally.

source: Upon expiration or termination of this Agreement for any reason, all rights and licenses granted to Licensee shall immediately cease, and Licensee shall immediately discontinue all use of the Licensed Software and return all copies to Licensor. Termination shall not relieve Licensee of its obligation to pay any fees accrued or payable to Licensor prior to the effective date of termination.
target: When this agreement ends, the Licensee must immediately stop using the software, stop all rights to use it, and return all copies to the Licensor. Ending the agreement does NOT cancel the Licensee's obligation to pay any fees that were already due before termination.
